tool_description: Live data about cryptocurrencies and their pricing in USD.
name: Cryptodeck
title: Cryptodeck

api_list.name: Get All Coins
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the live data about coins.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptodeck.p.rapidapi.com/coins"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptodeck.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptodeck.p.rapidapi.com/coins"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptodeck.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
